system.description:
A large (6’ tall, 4’ around) iron barrel which acts as a mechanical aquatic vehicle. Appears like a giant crab when in use.

  • Secret entry hatch: A secret entry hatch in one side allows entry to the apparatus.

  • Levers: Inside the apparatus are a series of levers with the following effects:

    1. Extend/retract legs and tail: With legs and tail extended, the apparatus can move at a rate of 60’ (20’) on land or in water.
    2. Uncover/cover forward porthole
    3. Uncover/cover side portholes
    4. Extend/retract pincers: When extended, the apparatus can attack.
    5. Snap pincers: Two attacks per round, THAC0 19 [0], [[/r 2d6]] damage.
    6. Move forward/backward
    7. Turn left/right
    8. Rise/sink in water
    9. Open/close eyes: Project light in a 30’ radius around the apparatus.
    10. Open/close secret hatch: When closed, the apparatus is watertight.

  • Combat stats: The apparatus is treated as a vehicle (see @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.LbHe6XO6WBsfDseJ.JournalEntryPage.QzjcHbKWy2QPveNh]{Vehicles}) with AC 0 [19] and 40 hull points.

  • Crew: Up to 2 human-sized people can fit inside the apparatus.

  • Air: Once sealed, there is air sufficient for [[/r 1d4+1]] hours (twice that if only a single person is inside).
